subject: Got results
body:
OK...*some*how I managed to get speakup to work and still keep my 
orca...*with* gnome-speech using Festival as well as speech dispatcher. 
Oddly though, I have a sort of echo if I go to rate #9 in speakup.  Not 
sure what this is.

Terrence
